name: Power Quiz: GEOlino
description:
PowerQuiz: GEOlino is a quiz game for children about general knowledge. As the player progresses through the game, he or she will improve his or her knowledge in several topics such as: animals, plants, the human Body, Science and Technology, art and history, planet Earth, world cultures, and the environment.

The questions in PowerQuiz: GEOlino are presented in thirteen different ways, for example as multiple choice or simple “Yes/No’s”. The player can unlock new backgrounds, menu colors and music as he spends the points that he earn during the game.
gamePlay: Board game, Game show / trivia / quiz, Paddle / Pong
